itemDescription: Scottish nobleman; far right political activist, involved with fascist parties and groups (1874-1963)

wikipedia_page.main: Patrick James Boyle, 8th Earl of Glasgow, DSO (18 June 1874 – 14 December 1963) was a Scottish nobleman and a far right political activist, involved with fascist parties and groups.

response: * Patrick Boyle, 8th Earl of Glasgow was a member of the House of Lords.
